records.context_note: Serious Incident between CPV and off Lesvos Island. SAR activated. Embarking the migrants to Vessel.
records.evidence_quote: Serious Incident between CPV and off Lesvos Island. Lesvos SE area. SAR activated.

records.evidence_quote: Close encounter between Frontex asset CPB and N of Lesvos Island in GRC territorial waters.

records.where_clear: Local hospital in an unspecified operational area
records.location_text_raw: Text removed - Operational Area, local hospital LT
records.uncertainty_note: Operational area and specific hospital location are redacted.
records.context_note: Two unaccompanied minors (UAM) attempted suicide and were transferred to a local hospital for medical treatment. No serious injuries were detected.
records.evidence_quote: Two attempted suicides by UAM in Text removed - Operational Area. No serious injuries were detected.

records.where_clear: A tent in an unspecified hotspot
records.location_text_raw: Hotspot, Text removed - Operational Area, in one of the tents in hotspot
records.context_note: A migrant was found dead in his tent in a hotspot, asphyxiated by fumes from a heating system. Frontex staff not involved.
records.evidence_quote: Migrant found dead in his tent. On 30.1.2017 there was found a dead body in one of the tents in hotspot.

records.where_clear: A tent in an unspecified hotspot
records.location_text_raw: Hotspot, in Hotspot there was found dead body in one of the tents
records.context_note: A 32-year-old Syrian national was found dead in a tent in a hotspot. The incident caused tensions among migrants. Frontex staff not involved.
records.evidence_quote: Dead body found in Hotspot. in Hotspot there was found dead body in one of the tents. The dead person is a 32 year old SYR national, male.
